name: Footccer: Real Football 2014 - A 3D Soccer clubs championship league
name_original: Footccer: Real Football 2014 - A 3D Soccer clubs championship league
description:
"Are you a football lover? You owe it to your self to play this real football 3d game"

Footccer is a Real Football / Soccer 3d game in which you can play with world champions.

Experience the free-kick action of your favorite 3D football / soccer game like no other! Kick-off from the centre of the football / soccer field, dribble your way to the opponent's goal, and kick the ball in for a score. This game will have you hooked for many matches as you watch your team make it to the winner cup finals. From realistic passes to powerful shots, this football / soccer game has it all.

How To Play:
Tap shoot button to score and pass button to pass the ball to your team player.
Move the player by using joystick.
score goals to win the league matches.

Game Features:
Real football includes time mode, tournament mode and practice mode.
Top 10 club teams to choose from.
smoother and more realistic graphics for both players and stadiums.
easy to use and responsive on-screen game controls.
cool 3d sounds.
Real football game contains realistic kick, goal keeper and pass animations.
Leaderboards includes that show highest matches you win.


Real football / soccer contains following club teams
Barcelona
Bayern Munich
Manchester United
Paris Saint German
Manchester City
Chelsea
Arsenal
Juventus
AC Milan
